events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly and I want to return it.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
Assigning this refund request case to agent Sarah M. for further assistance and processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 9876543210 and the jacket is unused and in original packaging, I want to return it because it’s too large.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate your refund and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label to send back the jacket at no cost.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the prepaid label, that makes the return process easier for me.
Your refund case is now resolved. The prepaid return label has been sent to your email, and once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund.
Just following up to check if you have been able to send back the jacket and if there’s anything else we can assist with.
Yes, I mailed the jacket yesterday using the prepaid label. Thank you for checking in!
The refund has been successfully processed and your case is now closed. Please reach out if you need any more help in the future.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on our refund process.
